articles.title: Differences Between US and Argentina When Raising Kids Around Drugs
articles.description: The author shares how her children have had access to marijuana and wine earlier than they would've in the US and says that has made them responsible.
articles.content:
I moved from the suburbs of Michigan to a small town in Argentina in 2009.
My kids at the time were 8, 6, and 4 years old.
Drugs were everywhere as my kids grew up, but now I know how beneficial that was for them.
Over 3 million people read Morning B... [3489 chars]

articles.title: Billboard Argentina
articles.description: Plus, Paulo Londra scores this week’s highest debut as “Nublado” enters at No. 23.
articles.content: Shakira and Rauw Alejandro’s “Te Felicito” holds strong atop the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated July 9) as the track adds a fourth week at the summit. It’s the longest-charting title at No. 1 for Rauw among a collection of three champs, inc... [1988 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Dry weather pushes down Argentina's wheat harvest forecast
articles.description: (Adds details from the statement)BUENOS AIRES, July 13 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat harvest for the 2022/23 season is expected at 17.7 million tonnes, down from a previous estimate of 18.5 million tonnes, the Rosario Grains Exchange (BCR) said late on Wednesday.The decrease comes due to a drop in the estimated planting area because of a drought in agricultural areas. articles.title: Dry weather seen pushing down Argentina's wheat harvest forecast
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, July 13 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat harvest for the 2022/23 season is expected to be about 17.7 million tonnes, down from a previous estimate of 18.5 million tonnes, the Rosario Grains Exchange (BCR) said on Wednesday.The exchange also revised up its 2021/22 season forecast for corn production to 51 million tonnes from 49.2 million.
